title: Customizable Dashboard Widgets
summary: Allows users to add and configure new widget types such as radial gauges and histograms to dashboards.

title: Dynamic Panel Rendering with React
summary: Implement React components for dynamic rendering of panels, allowing for more flexible and maintainable dashboard configurations.

title: Inconsistent Color Coding in Graph Panels
summary: Users report that color schemes in graph panels are inconsistent, leading to confusion in data interpretation.

title: Misleading Data Points in Graph Panels
summary: Graph panels display incorrect data points, leading to confusion and misinterpretation of metrics.

title: UI Freezes with Large Data Sets
summary: When users attempt to visualize large datasets, the Grafana dashboard becomes unresponsive, impacting data analysis workflows.

title: Incorrect Data Aggregation in Dashboard Panels
summary: Dashboard panels display incorrect aggregated metrics, leading to misleading data visualizations for users.
